GapFillDragDrop.Title: Verbs and transport
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the correct answer to each gap.

Content.Question:
1. In my town a lot of people ride bicycles to work.
2. We sometimes wait for our bus for an hour.
3. You can fly to Rome airport from Los Angeles.
4. What car do you drive?
5. Can I get to the cinema by bus?
6. Where can I get off for the city centre?
7. You can take/catch a taxi to the station.
8. I donâ€™t walk to work. I go by scooter.
